acorn = DuckDBClient.of({
  metadata: FileAttachment("/data/acorn-metadata.csv"),
  obs: FileAttachment("/data/acorn-sat.parquet")
})

acorn















Letâ€™s grab a subset of the ACORN-SAT data:

acornData = acorn.sql`
SELECT
  date, tmax
FROM
  obs
WHERE
  site_num == '086338'
`







Inputs.table(acornData)
